Text: The audio is out of sync on this copy, pity because the video quality is great and the movie looks really good...:(

if ya use vlc player there is an option that lets you sync the sound.. just hit the sound options and go to sync on the right. you can now speed up or slow down...
hope this helps..

using VLC media player, you can sync the audio by going into the Tools menu and clicking on Track Sync. i kno its a hassle but hey, so is taking the time to rip and upload a movie. so get over it or go to redbox and spend a $
